content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Good Clash for COC

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Just a typo "A battle ends when hp >= 0", you meant "<= 0" (but we guess it).

Transfert Aelita, scanner Aelita, virtualisation !

Good job. Possible improvements:
--"With the log of planned actions" -> "With the log of actions"
--"Because it's a plan, there can be extra turns." -> "" (delete this sentence)
--"A battle ends when hp >= 0" -> "A battle ends when the Hero's or Boss's hp <= 0"
--"Take into account that the Hero acts first, unless the Boss decides to heal, then Boss goes first." -> "The Hero acts first, unless actBoss involves healing"
--"The current hp can't be greater than their max health" -> "Their current hp can't exceed their initial health"
--"initial MAX health points" -> "initial health points"
LGTM, you need to fix the typos

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It a little bit tricky, and represents a good challenge to solve

The idea is fine, but there are some big things you need to change.

* Can't be binary output. I recommend changing the puzzle from just "who wins?" to also include "how much hp does the winner have left?"

* The statement is too long for CoC. At first glance, it seems that a good deal of it is redundant with the Input section, so you can trim down the statement down somewhat - try to get to around 1/2 of its current length.

* Thematically, it makes no sense for the battle to continue while one side is dead, so it makes it hard to understand this edge case. You can either remove such cases or change the Log to reflect "planned actions" instead of "past actions."

* Constraints should have lower and upper bounds specified.

" the Hero acts first, unless the Boss decides to heal"
This is confusing and doesn't appear to be tested anywhere.

Final Boss testcase: by my calculation the boss is still at 423 hp

Goal section
Please correct the following typos/issues:
* finnished -> finished
* de -> the
* you the turn log -> you have the turn log
* tha -> the
* batlle -> battle
* recieve -> receive
* max health -> max health.
* consists in -> consists of (appears 2 times)
* delete [[x]] because it is not used anywhere else in the statement
* 25 of damage -> 25 damage
* || -> and

Constraints section
* Please use separate lines for hpHero, hpBoss, attack damage and healing amount.

Thanks.
Thanks a lot for your help

By my calculations all seems correct.

Final Boss can't be solved without the " the Hero acts first, unless the Boss decides to heal" feature, anyway I added a Secret Boss which makes emphasis on that feature
